resources.string: BBC Podcast browsing application. Developed by Christian Dadswell

"Thanks for downloading BrowseCast. 
This is a very simple application to allow for easy searching/browsing of BBC Radio Podcasts.

 
Please feel free to feedback to the email address below if you have any problems or leave a comment on
 
http://www.chrisdadswell.co.uk 
If you enjoy this application, please rate and comment on Google Play. Thank you."

Acknowledgements
Special thanks go to my family whom I love very much and who gifted me the time to spend writing this application.

My brother for kindly hosting www.chrisdadswell.co.uk.

"Using BrowseCast: 
When you start BrowseCast for the first time it will download the latest BBC Podcasts listings to your SD card (/sdcard/browsecast/xml/podcasts.xml). The BBC update the Podcast listings daily, but you do not have to update daily if you do not wish to do so. 
:: The Dashboard :: 

The following options will be available to you;

 Podcast Search - Enter a podcast name search. i.e., Desert

You can press the search icon in the action bar or press the
 hardware search button if available on your handset/tablet.
 Browse Podcasts by Station - Returns a list of BBC Radio stations.

 

Searching for/or selecting a Station will present you with relevant Podcasts. 

Selecting a podcast will present you with further information about the podcast. 

Listen Live - Listen to live BBC Radio. This only works on select handsets and firmware revisions. 

Radio Schedules - Browse the wealth of BBC Radio schedules 

Radio iPlayer by Station - Browse the iPlayer Radio listings and listen to past recordings via your browser./n (Flash and non Chrome browser required. Not compatible with Android Jelly Bean.) 

Podcast Help and Assistance - Learn about Podcasts and applications that can be used for Podcasting on Android.
Share Podcast subscription with another application
Podcast list update available, click the download icon
Local listings status: Up to date

A BBC Podcast listings file needs to be downloaded, but there appears to be no internet connection.

Please connect to the internet
and relaunch BrowseCast.
View available BBC Radio stations with Podcasts
Select a BBC station to view Podcasts
